tv.freewheel.ad.interfaces

Interface ICreativeRendition


  • public interface ICreativeRendition
    Interface for creative rendition, only for renderer use by now.

        Parameters:
        contentType - content type of the rendition

      • getWidth

        int getWidth()
        Get width of the rendition.
        Returns:
        width in device-independent pixel for display ads; width in physical pixel for video ads.

      • setWidth

        void setWidth(int width)
        Set the width of the rendition.
        Parameters:
        width - width in device-independent pixel for display ads; width in physical pixel for video ads.

      • getHeight

        int getHeight()
        Get height of the rendition.
        Returns:
        height in device-independent pixel for display ads; height in physical pixel for video ads.

      • setHeight

        void setHeight(int height)
        Set the height of the rendition.
        Parameters:
        height - height in device-independent pixel for display ads; height in physical pixel for video ads.

      • getDuration

        double getDuration()
        Get duration of the rendition.
        Returns:
        duration in seconds

      • setDuration

        void setDuration(double duration)
        Set the duration of the rendition.
        Parameters:
        duration - duration in seconds

      • getPreference

        int getPreference()
        Get preference of the rendition.
        Returns:
        an int value, the higher is preferred among all renditions in the creative

      • setPreference

        void setPreference(int preference)
        Set the preference of the duration.
        Parameters:
        preference - integer, the larger the more preferred

      • getCreativeAPI

      • createCreativeRenditionAssetForTranslation

        ICreativeRenditionAsset createCreativeRenditionAssetForTranslation(java.lang.String name,
                                                                   boolean isPrimary)
        Create a creative rendition asset and add it to the creative rendition.
        Parameters:
        name - name of the asset
        isPrimary - whether or not to set the created asset as the primary asset
        Returns:
        the creative rendition asset that has been created
